DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study study person-centered structured team caretaking young adult ( 16-23 year ) newly diagnose rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) , spondartrit ( SpA ) psoriasartrit ( PsA ) routine clinical care affect predict patient 's health ability manage everyday life . Also include project long-term follow-up ( 50 year ) investigator want investigate factor predict good general health , low disease activity , good physical function , comorbidity .
DOC.brief_title: Follow-up Person-centered Care Young Adults With Rheumatic Disease
DOC.criteria: 1623 year newly diagnose RA accord ACR / EULAR 2010 criterion , SpA accord CASPAR criterion , AS accord ASAS criterion . Ability understand Swedish language speech write . Existing rheumatic disease Other healthcare demand serious illness
